Package edu.ou.cs2334.project5.views

Class NonogramMakerView

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project5.views.NonogramMakerView
public class NonogramMakerView extends Object
The CellGridView class represents the grid view of cells in the Nonogram Maker application. It provides methods to initialize and manage a grid of ToggleButtons.
Author:
iampo

    • NonogramMakerView

      public NonogramMakerView(int numRows, int numCols, int cellLength)
      Constructs a NonogramMakerView with the specified number of rows, columns, and cell length.
      Parameters:
      numRows - The number of rows in the Nonogram grid.
      numCols - The number of columns in the Nonogram grid.
      cellLength - The length of each cell in the grid.

      public void initButtons(int numRows, int numCols, int cellLength)
      Initializes the ToggleButtons in the cell grid with the specified number of rows, columns, and cell length.
      Parameters:
      numRows - The number of rows in the Nonogram grid.
      numCols - The number of columns in the Nonogram grid.
      cellLength - The length of each cell in the grid.

    • getToggleButton

      public javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton getToggleButton(int r, int c)
      Retrieves the ToggleButton at the specified row and column in the cell grid.
      Parameters:
      r - The row index of the ToggleButton.
      c - The column index of the ToggleButton.
      Returns:
      The ToggleButton at the specified row and column, or null if out of bounds.
